name: WOLF PUPS
description: Wolfies was created in June of 2021 as the primary currency of the Wolf Den Ecosystem. The Wolf Den team has created a decentralized eco system with the tools and advisory to help purpose driven individuals, companies and organizations use the decentralized world to get closer to what matters most to them in the real world. Since, Wolfies has become the primary currency of multiple defi projects across BNB chain and the Fantom Network as they use the unique NFT farming strategy of using Wolfies to farm unique NFTs with unique benefits. Wolfies tokenomics are designed to benefits from both stability and volaility equally, making it a unique asset in the defi space.
